mapper.insert: INSERT INTO o_order( uid, recv_name, recv_phone, recv_address, total_price, state, order_time, pay_time, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvAddress}, #{totalPrice}, #{state}, #{orderTime}, #{payTime}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )

INSERT INTO o_order_item ( oid, gid, title, image, price, num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{oid}, #{gid}, #{title}, #{image}, #{price}, #{num}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
